This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programmes are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided with tool,s guidance and resources for effective communication and advocay on child rightsissues..

description.narrative: During 2020, UNICEF Colombia maintained the same 2019 communications key performance targets regarding voice, reach and engagement in media. The communications section reinforced UNICEF’s work to support the COVID emergency by generating specific actions and prevention messages. Communications work during 2020 included organizing workshops for journalists, launching campaigns to promote breastfeeding and to broaden the voices of girls, among others, preparing and sharing press releases, webinars and social media messages on UNICEF’s and its allies’ actions in the prioritized territories. These actions supported UNICEF&39;s work and helped build its brand while supporting children’s engagement as advocates for their rights | Status:Met | As-of Date:18/01/2021

title.narrative: UNICEF's Colombia Communication and Public Advocacy Strategy encompasses three central objectives to be reached by the end of 2019: 1. REACH: Contribute from the CO to reach globally 1 billion people listening to UNICEF's positive voice.(45876), Text

baseline.value: 500 million positive views in Colombia through traditional and digital media.

target.value: 2020:Increase in 2% based on a minimum of 500 million positive views in traditional and digital media that is the baseline from 2019

title.narrative: ENGAGEMENT: UNICEF CO is committed to contribute to reach at least one billion and engage 50 million people by 2017. This is not limited to online and media channels but should include the number of people we reach through our offline initiatives. C4D ini, Text

baseline.value: Number of returning users to web-site.

title.narrative: VOICE: Contribute from the CO to the global objective: To be the world's most credible, trusted voice to drive change for children, by the engagement of people.(45877), Text

baseline.value: Obtain to 2019 at least 78% of UNICEF CO coverage that is favourable or higher in top-tier media.

target.value: 2020:Increase of minimum 2 percentage points over 76% UNICEF CO coverage that is favourable or higher in top-tier media
